The Honda WR-V’s suspension setup is softly sprung. It sails over minor potholes, slightly disjointed patches and small sharp bumps with aplomb. Storage capacity is another trump card, testified by the numerous stowage spaces such as cup holders and space in the front armrest and front seat pockets. The many reasons to purchase the Honda WR-V – practicality, spacious cabin and comfort.

The stylish fifth-generation Honda CR-V shares your spirit of adventure, and gives you the freedom and flexibility to explore the
world around you.The fluid lines of the CR-V were designed not only
to create a sleek and dynamic look, but also to assist performance by channelling airflow, resulting in improved fuel economy. The chrome garnish and rear skid plate provide the CR-V with an individual and purposeful look, while the door mirrors’ curved edges harmonise with theoverall design, reducing blind spots around the car. The dramatic window design provides superb all-round visibility and makes it a pleasure to be seen in.

The Peugeot Landtrek 1.9 4Action Double Cab 4x4 is an urban and off-road work vehicle that has a powerful muscular look and a key strength payload of up to 1000 kg. The Landtrek is the kind of vehicle that will never let you down no matter how tough the job is. It has all the comfort you need, its spacious and has a stylish interior too.
It comes with a 5 year or 100 000kms warranty and a 5 year or 100 000kms service plan. Trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
